pageProduct.name: Paroven Forte Tablets 60
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Paroven Forte 500mg Tablets provide relief of tired legs associated with chronic venous insufficiency.

Paroven is an aid in the relief of the symptoms of chronic venous insufficiency including tired, aching, heavy, painful or swollen legs.

Boxed Contents: 60 Tablets

Size: 60 Pack

Warnings

Do not take:
- if you are allergic to hydroxyethylrutosides.
- if you are pregnant, trying to become pregnant or breastfeeding.

Before use:
Talk to your doctor or pharmacist before use if:
- you have severe circulatory problems.
- you have oedema of the lower legs due to heart, kidney or liver disease.
Do not take if the foil seal over the tablets is torn or shown signs of tampering.

Ingredients

Contains: Each tablet contains Hydroxyethylrutosides 500 mg

Directions

- Initially 1 tablet twice a day for 3 to 4 weeks; then 1 tablet once a day.
- Swallow whole with water. Take with food.
- If symptoms persist, see your doctor.
- See enclosed leaflet for further information.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Do not take:
- if you are allergic to hydroxyethylrutosides.
- if you are pregnant, trying to become pregnant or breastfeeding.

Before use:
Talk to your doctor or pharmacist before use if:
- you have severe circulatory problems.
- you have oedema of the lower legs due to heart, kidney or liver disease.
Do not take if the foil seal over the tablets is torn or shown signs of tampering.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C. Protect from moisture.
